startpage.body:
Welcome to your "dynamic_content" installation

First off, thank you for choosing this software to run your website

I try to make this software to be the easiest to use and extend content management software there is.

I hope you'll enjoy using this software. If you are a developer please consider helping out with the development, I am always looking for aid and fresh ideas.

iris: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key
date_changed timestamp default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp
body_data: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key
date_changed timestamp default current_timestamp on update current_timestamp
page_fields: id int unsigned not null auto_increment unique primary key comment 'primary id for machine convenience'
machine_name varchar(200) not null unique comment 'machine readable name'
field_name varchar(200) not null comment 'human readable name'
content_type varchar(500) not null comment 'name of associated content type'
description text comment 'human readable field type description'
